content: लंब {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [लंब्-अच्] {@--1@} Hanging down, hanging from, pendent, dangling; पांड्योयमंसार्पितलंबहारः <ls>R. 6. 60</ls>, <ls n="R. 6.">84</ls>; <ls>Me. 84.</ls> {@--2@} Hanging upon, attached to. {@--3@} Great, large. {@--4@} Spacious. {@--5@} Long, tall. --बः {@--1@} A perpendicular. {@--2@} Co-latitude, the arc between the pole of any place and the zenith, complement of latitude. {@--3@} A bribe.
